import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import'../styles/Header.module.css';// Assuming CSS module or regular CSS file
import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Header=()=>{const[backgroundStyle,setBackgroundStyle]=useState('');useEffect(()=>{const time=new Date().getHours();let background='';if(time>=20||time<6){background='url("/path/to/night.jpg")';}else if(time>=6&&time<8){background='url("/path/to/dawn.jpg")';}else if(time>=8&&time<20){background='url("/path/to/day.jpg")';}else if(time>=16&&time<20){background='url("/path/to/sunset.jpg")';}setBackgroundStyle(background);},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("header",{style:{background:`${backgroundStyle} no-repeat center center / cover`},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"header-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"/path/to/photo.png",alt:"Ruslan Kain's photo"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"about-section",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"About Ruslan Kain"})})]})});};export default Header;
